text: Being is a mini-album by singer Ella Koon. The album was made by well known music producers Eric Kwok (Chinese) and Yanagiman (Japanese). Popular hits include: "Coral Island" (珊瑚島), "Incomplete Thoughts" (殘念), and "Silent Paper Kite" (響不了的紙鳶). ==Track listing== *1. 珊瑚島 *2. 殘念 *3. 響不了的紙鳶 *4. 簡單美 *5. 歐遊 *6. Dare To Be *7. 砂之迷路 (珊瑚島 日本版) *8. 殘念 (Piano Version) ==DVD Extras== *1. 殘念 MV *2. 珊瑚島 MV *3. Dare To Be MV *4. Making of 殘念 MV Category:2010 albums
title: Being (album)
